meanings.definition: To remove hair from (a part of the body) by depilation.
meanings.sent1: She decided to depilate her legs before going to the beach.
meanings.sent2: I regularly depilate my underarms to keep them smooth.
meanings.sent3: After a failed attempt to depilate her eyebrows, she ended up with a funny shape.
meanings.sent4: The laser hair removal treatment depilated her skin like magic.
meanings.sent5: The depilating cream made her skin feel soft and hair-free.

meanings.definition: To remove the hair from (a skin or hide) by chemical or mechanical means.
meanings.sent1: The taxidermist had to depilate the animal hide before starting the preservation process.
meanings.sent2: The spa uses a special wax to depilate the skin for their treatments.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy apprentice accidentally depilated the fur coat, causing a big mess.
meanings.sent4: The strong chemicals in the depilating solution effectively removed the hair from the hide.
meanings.sent5: The machine depilated the leather with precision, leaving it clean and ready for use.
